original_definition: '3-star compartment' means a frozen compartment with a target temperature and storage conditions of - 18 °C, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
generated_definition: '3-star compartment' means a compartment in a train or bus with seats that are designated as comfortable and offer additional amenities, such as more legroom or improved lighting.

Article 2: ‘3-star compartment’ means afrozen compartmentwith atarget temperature and storage conditions of - 18 °C, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
‘3-star compartment’ means a frozen compartment with a target temperature and storage conditions of - 18 °C, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
